about_the_game:
Game Overview:

COLOSSEUM is an epic game that combines action-adventure with deep role-playing elements. Players will play Victor, an ancient Roman general who was wronged, trapped in the bloody Colosseum, fighting against fate between life and death. The game combines exciting real-time battles, rich plot lines and exquisite graphics. Victor, who has been betrayed, framed and lost his freedom, must rely on his tenacious will and excellent fighting skills to defeat the powerful enemies in the Colosseum, unravel the conspiracy of the court, and finally restore his glory and freedom. Each decision will affect the development of the plot and the final outcome, bringing players an unforgettable adventure.

Game Features：

1. Rich plot lines and multiple endings

In "Colosseum", the plot is the soul of the game. Players will embark on an adventure in a world full of betrayal, conspiracy and power struggle. You will face the powerful oppression from the empire and make a key moral choice, will you be loyal to the past or betray for freedom? Every decision will profoundly affect the direction of the story, and finally usher in multiple endings: Uncover the darkness behind the empire, or bury everything in the bloody Colosseum?

2. Wonderful combat system and action experience

The game adopts a highly smooth real-time combat system, and players can experience fierce and strategic battles. Every battle is full of challenges. Players will fight with other gladiators, ferocious beasts, and even powerful enemy generals.

 

3. Exquisite visuals and immersive world

The game's graphics are full of historical charm and detailed carvings, faithfully reproducing the glory and cruelty of the ancient Roman Empire. The Colosseum, the city square, the depths of the palace and other scenes have been carefully designed, and players will immerse themselves in a real ancient Roman world. The meticulous environment, exquisite character modeling, as well as the shocking special effects and dynamic weather system make every battle more exciting.

4. Deep role-playing and growth system

Victor's growth and development are in your control. Players can improve the character's combat ability, skills and survival skills according to their personal game style. Each player's choice will create a unique gaming experience.

  

5. Epic battles and life-and-death duels

The battles in the game are not limited to single duels in the Colosseum, players will also participate in larger-scale battles. You will face powerful enemy forces, elite generals, and even participate in power struggles inside and outside the court, using your wisdom and strength to defeat the enemy. In this land full of blood and glory, every battle is a challenge to life. Only by winning can you get close to the ultimate freedom and glory.

Suitable for players: 

1. Players who like deep plots and multiple endings

2. Players who are keen on exciting battles and tactical choices

3. Players who appreciate beautiful pictures and immersive worlds

Some of the plots that players will experience in the game:

  • Fire Competition

  • Simulated Naval Battle

  • Epic Behemoth

  • Zombie Frenzy

  • National Carnival

  • Final Battle

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big sur 11
  • Processor: inter core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably with a discrete graphics card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14 or above
  • Processor: Apple M-series chips
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Independent graphics card or M series integrated graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably with a discrete graphics card

name: 斗兽场 COLOSSEUM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3-4590 and above processors
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably with a discrete graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably with a discrete graphics card

short_description: In COLOSSEUM, players become Victor, a wronged general turned gladiator battling for survival in ancient Rome's arenas. Engage in real-time combat, face diverse enemies, and use tactics to uncover secrets. Fight for freedom and reunite with your family!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
